form.placeholder_full: What excites you about being a part of this community?
What do you want this community to know about you?
How do you want to engage with this community? What do you hope to receive?
What does the world you know in your heart is possible look like?
What value do you see yourself bringing? What are your superpowers?
Do you feel like you are currently thriving (purpose/finances/health)? If not, where do you want to focus and what support would be most useful to you?

points_month.name: Monthly Points Cache - used for timelines

form.placeholder: Message to include in the stream announcement.

need.name: Create a Request
need.title: Create a Request
need.guidelines: Requests are something youd like to receive, whether to purchase, to trade, or to be freely given (please specify your desire). If there is any promise or giving required in response, its a request.

form.placeholder: Please give a reason for the post not being approved
Request - what do you want to call in?
Offer - what do you have to offer? Points, money, time...?

immediate.name: if it is immediately requiring attention

upset.name: Report an Upset
upset.title: Report an Upset
upset.guidelines: Upsets are a violation of our personal standards not being met. In the ONE|Boulder community, we assume positive intent and recognize upsets as an opportunity to more clearly express our standards. Get more information on our Upset Resolution Protocol here.

message.name: Message about what the upset is...

content.name: Message about the bug and how to reproduce it

message.name: Message about the bug and how to reproduce it

offer.name: Share an Offer
offer.title: Share an Offer
offer.guidelines: Offers are something youd like to gift the community or someone in the community (a social outing or adventure, a physical item to be reused or upcycled, etc)

form.placeholder: Please give a reason for the post not being approved
Offer - What do you want to give?

Ask - would you like anything in exchange?  Points or Trade?  You may set a buy it now price in $USD but in this ecosystem requests for money can be supplemented with points. While points are not a transactional currency the intention is that our social capital (points) can lower our dependency on money over time.
Purpose - Why are you offering this? How does it contribute to or forward the game?

showremaining.name: Show Remaining Tickets on event page

approval_donation.name: Suggested donation on questionaire to attend event

showremaining.name: Show Remaining Tickets on event page

stopsales.name: Stop Ticket Sales sometime before event?

stopmessage.name: Message to display when ticket sales are ended

approved.name: Allowed
approved.description: This person can attend and will have access to purchasing a ticket

denied.name: Denied
denied.description: This person is denied from attending and will not have access to purchasing a ticket.

no_response.name: No Response
no_response.description: A response has not been made yet

event_ticketemail.name: Event
event_ticketemail.guidelines: The ticket email is sent immediately after someone gets a ticket.  This will include QR codes for the tickets they got.  You can edit the subject, header image, and content that is displayed in the email.  If you do not fill this out, a default email message will be used.

form.default:
Congratulations [to.data.firstname]!

You are going to [event.name] on [event.pretty_time]!

Please show the attached QR code at the door on the day of the event.

form.placeholder: Goal Description - what will reaching this goal enable?

expense.name: Expense
expense.description: Expense to be deducted to calculate profit

fixed.name: Perk
fixed.description: This contribution is based on a Perk being offered

donation.name: Donation
donation.description: This contriubtion is directly donation based

fixed.name: Fixed Price
fixed.description: Tickets are sold by a fixed price, eg $5/ticket

donation.name: Donation
donation.description: The donation amount is set by the purchaser.

event_ticketconfirmation.name: Event
event_ticketconfirmation.guidelines: The ticket confirmation is displayed immediately after a person gets a ticket.  This will be showin in the app or the website.

form.default:
Congrats!

You are going to [event.name]!

We emailed you a copy of your receipt.

perms.name: List of permissions, like internal oauth2

private.name: Private
private.description: Only those who have a link can view the event.

event.name: Create an Event
event.title: Create an Event
event.guidelines: For a tutorial on how to do ticketing for your event, check out this link. Do not share Facebook or Eventbrite links. Do not ask people to pay you through venmo.

private.name: Private
private.description: Only those who have a link can view the event.

autopublish.name: Auto Publish 3-4 days before the event
autopublish.tooltip: (Producer Only) When auto-publish is enabled, an event invite will be broadcasted 3-4 days before an event.
